Modifications.Value: Blasts enemy units around a target enemy unit with a wave of damaging frost that slows movement and attack rate for 6 seconds. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - 100 target damage, 100 nova damage. |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - 125 target damage, 150 nova damage. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - 150 target damage, 200 nova damage. |n|cffffcc00Level 4|r - 175 target damage, 250 nova damage.
Blasts enemy units with a wave of frost that deals <AUfn,DataB4> damage to the target, and <AUfn,DataA4> nova damage. Cold damage slows units' movement and attack rate for <AUfn,Dur4> seconds.
